thoughts.text: Now that I have a list of potential destinations and languages to learn, I should start looking for language learning resources on GitHub. I can use the Clone Repository command to download any relevant repositories.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to make sure that I have access to the best language learning resources available, and many of them are available on GitHub.
thoughts.plan: - Use the Clone Repository command to download any relevant language learning repositories from GitHub
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am downloading reputable and high-quality repositories, and not wasting my time on low-quality resources.
thoughts.speak: Now that I have a list of potential destinations and languages to learn, should I start looking for language learning resources on GitHub?
